records.Name: Eagle's Nest
records.Description__c: Perched high with amazing views of the valley. Primitive site with no facilities.

records.Name: Lakeside Haven
records.Description__c: Beautiful waterfront site with easy access to fishing and swimming.

records.Name: Forest Retreat
records.Description__c: Secluded site nestled among tall pines. Great for wildlife viewing.

records.Name: Sunset Point
records.Description__c: Spectacular sunset views from this coastal bluff site.

records.Name: Desert Oasis
records.Description__c: Unique desert camping experience with nearby natural spring.
